## ErrorXOptions type

Configuration options for creating an ErrorX instance. All properties are optional with sensible defaults.

**Signature:**

```typescript
type ErrorXOptions = {
    message?: string;
    name?: string;
    code?: string | number;
    uiMessage?: string | undefined;
    cause?: Error | unknown;
    metadata?: ErrorMetadata;
    actions?: ErrorAction[];
};
```
**References:** [ErrorMetadata](./error-x.errormetadata.md)<!-- -->, [ErrorAction](./error-x.erroraction.md)
